story:
ABOUT ME 

  • hi im clay, I've been a black smith since i was 5, im now 22 and want to offer people away to watch me as i work, and this would be the first live streaming of its kind and only one. 
  • im raising this money to buy a laptop to stream myself working and creating knives, and swords, also to enhance my videos to my followers, viewers, and subscribers.
  • i have many disabling health problems which prevents me from having any sort of stable income, and helping raise money for this laptob would give me a outlet, to reach out to more people to sell my knives, and provide them with new and better entertainment. 


What We Need & What You Get

  • i would like to raise 1,000.00 to be able to get the best laptop i can get, if i dont reach my goal i will use whatever we raised to get a laptop at that price range, or put the money in to knife materials so nothing will be wasted. 
  • if we make the goal or just get enough to get a laptop i will be able to give people entertainment and content that no one else has done !

if we make the goal or just get enough to get a laptop i will be able to give people entertainment and content that no one else has done !

story:
Short Summary

Lunar Blast Interactive was established in February 2012, and we started working on our first game, Dark Spiral, in October of 2013. We're almost ready to enter the Alpha stages of development, where we'll be creating the music, in-game art, and start constructing the game in the engine.

We've reached a point of development, however, where it would be very difficult to continue without proper funding.

Dark Spiral is a first person sci-fi RPG set in an authentic universe, featuring rich and believable backstory and history, unique NPCs with personalities, and interesting weapons and abilities.

What We Need & What You Get

What will we use the funding for? Well:

  • $3500 will go towards the team, paying bonuses for the work they've completed so far
  • $300 will go towards setting the studio up
  • $1200 will go towards software we need for development
  • Any extra money we raise will go towards salaries and marketing, split 75/25
So, why should you donate? What do you get? Well:
  • $15 gets you the finished game upon completion (digital)
  • $30 gets you the Digital Deluxe edition, featuring a digital artbook, the game soundtrack, Dark Spiral wallpapers, and a graphic novel set in the Dark Spiral universe
  • $50 gives you access to all future Dark Spiral content (Expansion Packs) for free, as well as the Digital Deluxe edition of the game.
  • $75 gets your name in the credits of the game, under "Special Thanks", as well as the previous tier award.  Also opts you in for the Beta of Dark Spiral
  • $125 opts you in for the Alpha of Dark Spiral
  • $250 gives you a chance to write a side-quest for the game. Discuss with the Lead Writer and create a unique quest that appears in the final game! Quests subject to approval. Also gets you 2 copies of the Digital Deluxe edition of Dark Spiral
  • $500 gets your face in the game as an NPC! Our Character Artist will sculpt your face from 3 reference images and lets you become a NPC somewhere in the game. Also gets you 3 copies of the Digital Deluxe edition of Dark Spiral
  • $750 gains you access to ALL future game content created by Lunar Blast Interactive, including games, expansion packs, DLC, and everything in between!
  • $1000 allows you to voice an important character in Dark Spiral! Microphone audio quality subject to approval. Includes the previous tier award
  • $2500 gets your name in the credits as an Executive Producer of Dark Spiral. Includes the $750 tier award
  • $5000 gets your face in EVERY game we produce! That's right, become an important NPC in every game we ever produce. We'll even create a unique model for every game, if your appearance changes!
  • $10,000 gets your name on the Lunar Blast Interactive website forever, puts your name in the credits of all of our games (as an Executive Producer), gains you access to all content produced by Lunar Blast Interactive, and lets you pitch your game, quest, or character ideas whenever you like. Hell, become an honorary member of Lunar Blast Interactive if you want!
So, what happens if we don't meet our funding requirement? Well, as you saw, we're opting for flexible funding, simply because any money we receive will help us greatly. Even if we don't reach our $10,000 goal, we'll still be able to do something with it.

The Impact

Lunar Blast Interactive is a relatively new indie game developer, and as such we don't really have a fanbase yet. We want to deliver quality games to the gaming community, and we want to do something far too developer do: listen.

We aim to listen to what our community and fans want, and be more involved with them than your average developer. We're open to e-mail conversations, ideas, suggestions, requests, complaints, or what-have-you's. If we do something that you don't like, we'll change it. If we do something you do like, we'll improve on it and bring it back better.

Our main focus is role-playing games with deep stories, realistic dialogue with characters with unique personalities, interesting and fun gameplay, immersive experiences, and ambitious new ideas.

If this campaign succeeds, we'll be able to make our dreams a reality, and deliver quality, immersive games to you. Even if the project fails to make any money, we'll still push on and deliver, but it will be harder, if not nearly impossible.

We're not in the industry for money, we're here because all of us have a passion for gaming and game development, and as such our games will never be overpriced. We'll ask the community what they think the price should be, and listen to their advice.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? Don't worry, we still love you! If you want to help out, but can't donate, share the IndieGoGo campaign everywhere you can. Facebook, Reddit, Twitter, forums, your local bar & grill, or simply to your friends.

Anything helps!

story:
Help to migrate to GTK+-3

We have already started the work on issue5387 but we see that it is not going fast enough to catch with the trunk development. But now it is time to do the migration to GTK+-3 and to switch to Python-3.

Advantages

  • CSS
  • HTML5 backend
  • Wayland support
  • new widgets like: GtkStack, GtkHeaderBar, GtkListBox, GtkPopover, etc.
  • gesture/multi-touch
  • Python-3

Planning

  • For series 4.2:
    • add support of GTK+-3 with compatibility with GTK+-2
    • provide experimental build on GTK+-3 for Windows and MacOS
  • For series 4.4:
    • remove support of GTK+-2
    • start to add GTK+-3 only features
    • use 2to3 to support Python-3

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute with money, you can help:

  • By testing the software and report issues.
  • Spread the world about this campaign.

story:
What makes us unique?

Let's face it, there is a need for good Role Models in the gaming community. Instead of using sex or foul language to be funny, we are a channel built on clean humor to entertain our youth audience. We are providing a place where people of all ages can go, where they can sit back and enjoy their time while being a part of a constructive social experience. Our channel offers a place where kids can come interact with others, make friends, while learning how to carry a conversation with respect, rather than trash talk. Most of youtube is not live, the audience just watches a pre-made video. On our channel we are playing live in front of an audience and talking back and forth with them. This is much more engaging.

What will the money go towards?

$6,000- This is the bare minimum we need to properly upgrade our equipment. We need 2 new high end desktops that can be used as gaming pc's while they stream the video and commentary to YouTube. This money will also buy new mics and facecams

$20,000- This target would allow Travis and Jim to drop their full time jobs to do YouTube full time. The money would go towards a studio together with a business internet connection

$40,000-$200,000- This target would give us the money to buy google advertising. At 75 cents per subscriber, this would put us up over the 100 thousand subscriber mark which is considered a legitimate milestone for any YouTuber. 

Risks and challenges

The challenge of being a YouTuber is consistency. We are very talented, but having to work full time jobs other than YouTube to put food on the table, has made it impossible to do our livestreams during the prime hours of the day. If we could stream every day at the same time, we would have grown so much more than we have this far. Once we get to a certain point where YouTube can pay our living expenses, we will be able to do it on a scheduled basis and really take off.

story:
Wanna be able to play 33 different games while at the beach, camping, tailgating, or just hanging out in your backyard?


So do we!  That's why we invented....BeanBagglz

WORLD'S 1st TOSSING GAME w/


CLAIM YOUR FAVORITE GAMES

Here is just small sample of some of the 33 different games we offer. We will also be releasing new games as the campaign gains momentum. Please share your new game ideas as well...this is your game. Once the campaign ends, we will send out a "survey" from Backers Kit which allows you to choose whichever templates you want. For now, you only have to decide how many games you want to enjoy this Summer.


GAME CONFIGURATIONS

You can play games vertically, horizontally, level, and even with our revolutionary MAGIC SQUARES™. With four adjustable locking legs, you can vary the difficulty level and literally put your own spin on the game.


Other Ways You Can Help

We know some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.


Your BEANBAGGLZ™ has double sided templates which are multi-themed. Enjoy Betting Games such as Poker Pass™, Drinking Games like Goofy Golf™, and our version of traditional Cornhole called Corn Cube™.  Even get Bonus Games like all of our Magic Square Sets™.

Your BEANBAGGLZ™ is completely self-contained and includes a built-in storage bin for all of your game templates and accessories.  

You have easy access to store and organize

  • Up to 9 different double-sided game templates
  • 15 Magic Squares
  • 15 Beanbag Billiard Balls
  • Optional Chess, Checker, and Backgammon Pieces

Your BEANBAGGLZ™ is as mobile as you. Your game is made of light-weight yet durable plastic. Complete with 3" extra wide wheels and reinforced handles, your game is easy to transport and can be played everywhere you go.

Stylish and functional, your sleek new Wheel Hubs not only look great, they allow the unit to stand straight up and down while you store and organize your templates.

Your BEANBAGGLZ™ can easily be converted into a perfect game table. You can play your favorite card or dice games. Flip the top over and play Chess, Checkers, and Backgammon. There is so much space, 4 players can play 2 different games at the same time! (Game pieces not included)

When you want to take a break from the fun, transform your BEANBAGGLZ™ console into the perfect playing surface for all of your favorite party games such as Beer Pong, King's Cup, and Flip Cup.

Your BEANBAGGLZ™ comes with 4 adjustable locking legs. Change the slant to change the difficulty level. Even rotate the game, and literally put your own spin on the game. 

BEANBAGGLZ™ has 15 compartments for the storage of your billiard squares and bean bags. In addition, you can safely store all of your valuables in the hidden storage compartments. Perfect size for optional chess, checker, and backgammon game pieces.


BEANBAGGLZ™ is completely self-contained and easily stores under your bed, fits in your closet, or in your RV/Camper just waiting for your next family experience.


Risks & Challenges

We pride ourselves on offering the highest quality products made to our highest standards and expectations. We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Indiegogo OnDemand and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what I see as the risks:

MANUFACTURING: Creating the tooling to manufacture a product of this size is expensive and requires expert knowledge to get it right. There is typically a 40-60 day lead time to create the molds for a product of this size and this is where delays could occur. To minimize that possibility we're working with tooling manufacturing partners with a track record for prompt quality.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As BEANBAGGLZ™ gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced manufacturing partners. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things go awry that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks we will enter the manufacturing stage with at least one back-up supplier for each component pre-located and our product commercialization experts will help ensure smooth sailing from our suppliers and factories.

We will be working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. There will no doubt be some surprises along the road, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and an overall goal of making the best possible product for you, our BEANBAGGLZ™ Community.

We are humbled by your interest and say THANK YOU for your help!

story:
ODiN, an innovative electro-optical mouse that starts your experience anew.

ODiN Aurora presents you a whole new experience with computer and mouse. The world's first laser projection mouse redefines your daily user habits for designing, gaming, work, and everything. Light and easy to carry, ODiN Aurora is your must-have gadget for computers and laptops. It’s all designed just for you.

Honorably, ODiN won "Compuex d&i award" and " BC award" in 2015 and has drawn attention of major media across the globe.

  

                                                    

According to an old Norse poem, ODiN the major diety is the originator of the runes. On that note, we believe ODiN is an innovative product that challenges people’s perception of electro-optical applications, and opens up a whole new world of endless possibilities.

The triangle runic symbol is now your self-defined button.

Inspired by Nordic mythology, ODiN Aurora embodies the powerful figure. Laser beams are projected as lightning when the legendary Odin throws his spear. A triangle, innovative and extraordinary in Runic alphabets, is also incorporated in the virtual pad design, projecting strength and courage into our life.


Does your arm or wrist feel tired or even hurt after holding the traditional mouse for a long time? No more pain! The problem is solved with ODiN Aurora. As your wrist comfortably rests on the table or other surfaces, your shoulder and arm muscles can take a break, so you can focus on work, game, or both, or anything!


ODiN Aurora supports multipoint controls. In the 8cm x 8cm project area, you only need, at most, three fingers to click, scroll, drag and zoom, as easy as that! With low CPU loading and responsive design, it enables smoother net-surfing and gaming experiences, wherever you go.  
 

  •  The gestures of ODiN in use

  •  Different scenarios when ODiN in use

  •  ODiN's New Function: Three finger Gesture/ODiN's first game: ODiN jump

You will see different options here. 


Let's start to play!


ODiN's New Feature

ODiN’s new feature, a user-defined application “button,” is here! The triangle runic symbol is now a “button” for you to define, in both Windows and Mac. Be it open a particular software or “back to the desktop”, the button is at your disposal. For the laser button, you can code your own macro and even share it on Serafim’s online forum! 


  •  ODiN key: users' guide (Both Mac & Windows)
Go to Serafim's website and click "Software Download" in "Support".

http://www.serafim-tech.com/odin/software-download.htm

1.     Website: 
Paste a  website, set the awaiting time and click "add". Click ODiN key and the webpage will show.
2. Application: 
Click the blank, choose an application and set the time. Add it and click ODiN key.
3. Hot Key:
Enter a shortcut, set the time, and click "add". Click ODiN key to let the magic happen! 



Tiny and portable, ODiN Aurora only weighs 40 grams, fits well in your pocket or backpack, and consumes very littler power! This is the best travel companion for business travelers and your office on the go. It's compatible with Windows XP and later, as well as Mac OS. We will also continue to update software, so ODiN Aurora never goes outdated. Plug in to USB hub, and you're ready to enjoy!

Privacy has been a concern for some people as they use gesture controllers, such as virtual keyboards, as cameras are integrated in the operation. Well, no worries with ODiN Aurora! With no camera involved, your privacy is ensured. It's good for confidential meetings of course, with doubled response speeds, minimized sensing modules, and smaller package.


Although ODiN Aurora is our debut project under Serafim, our development and design team has already got extensive experiences in optoelectronics industry over ten years, working and taking orders from manufacturers all over the world. We aim to offer affordable, useful and cool devices for your better computing experience, and ODiN Aurora is the result after one year in development.
 
ODiN Aurora comes in three colors: metal green, bright silver, and charcoal black. We maintain the best coloring process, so what you see is what you get!

  • Bonus!




Founded in 2010 by a group of experts in optoelectronics industry, Serafim aims to offer affordable, useful and cool consumer electronics for a better computing experience. Team members obtain extensive experiences in local and international vendors, before building a brand of their own.
Serafim is derived from seraphs in Christian theology. It's the highest choir of the angelic hierarchy, representing light, thunder and fire. We aim to reach the highest rank in our professional fields with our passion. 


After designing smartphones, tablets and computer accessories for international brands, ODiN Aurora is the debut project of Serafim.


Q1. How do I buy in bulk? 

A: Please contact Serafim directly, thank you.

Q2. Can I enlarge or shrink the projection area? 

A: The laser projection area is not resizable.

Q3. Does the mouse work on uneven surface? 

A: Please avoid using the mouse on uneven surface as it is only suitable for even surface.

Q4. How long is the battery life?

 A: Simply connect the mouse to a USB port on your computer/laptop, and you're good to go. No need for battery.

Q5. How will the product be sent to me? 

A: We will send the product by Taiwan Post Office's Express Mail.

Q6. What's the size of the product and how much does it weigh?

 A: It's 5cm(H)x4cm(W)x2cm(D) and it weighs 40 grams.

Q7. Can I change the color of the projection?

 A: Not for now. Currently it can only be red.

Q8. When can I receive the product?

 A: Our first shipment will be in October.

Q9. Can I choose models with different colors?

 A: Currently, we offer three colors for your choice. We will develop more color options based on feedback given by our customers.

Q10. What OS does the mouse support? 

A: It is compatible with both Windows and Mac.

Q11. Does the laser of the product meet laser safety standards? 

A: Yes, it meets the regulations of IEC-60825 Class I.

Risks and challenges

For many Indiegogo projects, it's especially difficult to choose the right manufacturers for production. With over a decade of experiences in optoelectronics industry, our team in Serafim will ensure the best quality and features for ODiN Aurora, our debut project.

Quality control is also a main focus for Serafim. Unlike traditional rectangular or oval shape, ODiN Aurora is designed with more stylish details. Although it may require a little more time, we will conduct all necessary tests and assembly processes before delivery to maintain the highest standards.

Terms and Conditions

Product Shipment

The product you purchased will be shipped after we receive your payment. It will take 7 to 21 working days to ship products to the delivery address you specified.

EMS Shipment

EMS Express handles the delivery of your orders. Please do notify us if you do not receive the purchased items within 6 months. Otherwise, the EMS tracker will delete all data that is older than 6 months, and there will be no way to trace back the shipping details of your orders.
story_txt:
ODiN, an innovative electro-optical mouse that starts your experience anew.


ODiN Aurora presents you a whole new experience with computer and mouse. The world's first laser projection mouse redefines your daily user habits for designing, gaming, work, and everything. Light and easy to carry, ODiN Aurora is your must-have gadget for computers and laptops. It’s all designed just for you.


Honorably, ODiN won "Compuex d&i award" and " BC award" in 2015 and has drawn attention of major media across the globe.


  
                                                    

According to an old Norse poem, ODiN the major diety is the originator of the runes. On that note, we believe ODiN is an innovative product that challenges people’s perception of electro-optical applications, and opens up a whole new world of endless possibilities.


The triangle runic symbol is now your self-defined button.

Inspired by Nordic mythology, ODiN Aurora embodies the powerful figure. Laser beams are projected as lightning when the legendary Odin throws his spear. A triangle, innovative and extraordinary in Runic alphabets, is also incorporated in the virtual pad design, projecting strength and courage into our life.



Does your arm or wrist feel tired or even hurt after holding the traditional mouse for a long time? No more pain! The problem is solved with ODiN Aurora. As your wrist comfortably rests on the table or other surfaces, your shoulder and arm muscles can take a break, so you can focus on work, game, or both, or anything!




ODiN Aurora supports multipoint controls. In the 8cm x 8cm project area, you only need, at most, three fingers to click, scroll, drag and zoom, as easy as that! With low CPU loading and responsive design, it enables smoother net-surfing and gaming experiences, wherever you go.   




 The gestures of ODiN in use
 Different scenarios when ODiN in use



 ODiN's New Function: Three finger Gesture/ODiN's first game: ODiN jump







You will see different options here. 





Let's start to play!






ODiN's New Feature
ODiN’s new feature, a user-defined application “button,” is here! The triangle runic symbol is now a “button” for you to define, in both Windows and Mac. Be it open a particular software or “back to the desktop”, the button is at your disposal. For the laser button, you can code your own macro and even share it on Serafim’s online forum! 
 ODiN key: users' guide (Both Mac & Windows)

Go to Serafim's website and click "Software Download" in "Support".
http://www.serafim-tech.com/odin/software-download.htm
1.     Website: 
Paste a  website, set the awaiting time and click "add". Click ODiN key and the webpage will show.
2. Application: 
Click the blank, choose an application and set the time. Add it and click ODiN key.
3. Hot Key:
Enter a shortcut, set the time, and click "add". Click ODiN key to let the magic happen! 







Tiny and portable, ODiN Aurora only weighs 40 grams, fits well in your pocket or backpack, and consumes very littler power! This is the best travel companion for business travelers and your office on the go. It's compatible with Windows XP and later, as well as Mac OS. We will also continue to update software, so ODiN Aurora never goes outdated. Plug in to USB hub, and you're ready to enjoy!





Privacy has been a concern for some people as they use gesture controllers, such as virtual keyboards, as cameras are integrated in the operation. Well, no worries with ODiN Aurora! With no camera involved, your privacy is ensured. It's good for confidential meetings of course, with doubled response speeds, minimized sensing modules, and smaller package.





Although ODiN Aurora is our debut project under Serafim, our development and design team has already got extensive experiences in optoelectronics industry over ten years, working and taking orders from manufacturers all over the world. We aim to offer affordable, useful and cool devices for your better computing experience, and ODiN Aurora is the result after one year in development.


 
ODiN Aurora comes in three colors: metal green, bright silver, and charcoal black. We maintain the best coloring process, so what you see is what you get!







Bonus!









Founded in 2010 by a group of experts in optoelectronics industry, Serafim aims to offer affordable, useful and cool consumer electronics for a better computing experience. Team members obtain extensive experiences in local and international vendors, before building a brand of their own.

Serafim is derived from seraphs in Christian theology. It's the highest choir of the angelic hierarchy, representing light, thunder and fire. We aim to reach the highest rank in our professional fields with our passion. 

After designing smartphones, tablets and computer accessories for international brands, ODiN Aurora is the debut project of Serafim.


Q1. How do I buy in bulk? 
A: Please contact Serafim directly, thank you.
Q2. Can I enlarge or shrink the projection area? 
A: The laser projection area is not resizable.
Q3. Does the mouse work on uneven surface? 
A: Please avoid using the mouse on uneven surface as it is only suitable for even surface.
Q4. How long is the battery life?
 A: Simply connect the mouse to a USB port on your computer/laptop, and you're good to go. No need for battery.
Q5. How will the product be sent to me? 
A: We will send the product by Taiwan Post Office's Express Mail.
Q6. What's the size of the product and how much does it weigh?
 A: It's 5cm(H)x4cm(W)x2cm(D) and it weighs 40 grams.
Q7. Can I change the color of the projection?
 A: Not for now. Currently it can only be red.
Q8. When can I receive the product?
 A: Our first shipment will be in October.
Q9. Can I choose models with different colors?
 A: Currently, we offer three colors for your choice. We will develop more color options based on feedback given by our customers.
Q10. What OS does the mouse support? 
A: It is compatible with both Windows and Mac.
Q11. Does the laser of the product meet laser safety standards? 
A: Yes, it meets the regulations of IEC-60825 Class I.

Risks and challenges
For many Indiegogo projects, it's especially difficult to choose the right manufacturers for production. With over a decade of experiences in optoelectronics industry, our team in Serafim will ensure the best quality and features for ODiN Aurora, our debut project.
Quality control is also a main focus for Serafim. Unlike traditional rectangular or oval shape, ODiN Aurora is designed with more stylish details. Although it may require a little more time, we will conduct all necessary tests and assembly processes before delivery to maintain the highest standards.


Terms and Conditions
Product Shipment
The product you purchased will be shipped after we receive your payment.
It will take 7 to 21 working days to ship products to the delivery address you specified.
EMS Shipment
EMS Express handles the delivery of your orders. Please do notify us if you do not receive the purchased items within 6 months. Otherwise, the EMS tracker will delete all data that is older than 6 months, and there will be no way to trace back the shipping details of your orders.

But I started to make games with HTML5 in the name of

Thanks for your support,now the number of visitors have been increasing gladually.


 
Anyway I have to release new games,continuously to recover.
I'm glad for your support from now on.
Even though the croud-funding had finished You can buy each extra bonus.
I'm happy if you enjoy my games!

Thanks picture
I'll send you an unlock password for the illustrashon pazle.
test play
Thanks mini game
I'll send you an unlock password for the mini GROW game.
test play
Secret password
I'll send you a secret password, built as the bonus mode in the next new game. 
Give the right
I'll give you the right to play the next new game a week earlier on a launch day, in secret.


 
You can also pay by PayPal

story:
Summary

iN-Motion Game Jam is a hackathon that raises the awareness of people with disabilities and the increasing movement of educational game apps. On July 27-28, 2013, iN-Motion Game Jam will host this hackathon on behalf of Bethel Center, a 501(c)(3) Non Profit Organization for people with Disabilities.

The event will be located at YetiZen at 540 Howard Street, 2nd Floor in San Francisco, CA.

Developers, artists, and other creative professionals will gather during a 24-hour period to make one or more educational games to target the usage for and awareness of people with disabilities. In partnership with Vast Apps, Inc. and other sponsors, these apps will be used to connect special needs users to engage in these games or educational programs. 

We hope to gain the support of our continuing sponsors for this great cause. Currently, we are working hard to increase participants and contributors for this 501(c)(3) non-profit fundraiser to benefit the Bethel Center. Please visit our website to for more information at www.iN-MotionGameJam.com

What We Need & What You Get

Details:

  • What we need is $2,000 to make the event possible
    • $1,500 for rental space
    • $500 for food
    • additional funds go towards improving the event and to The Bethel Center a 501(c)(3) Non Profit Organization
  • Perks are made by The Bethel Center
    • a thank you card from our special friends
    • art work from our special friends
    • art work of the clients from instructor Angelo Hizon
    • thank you basket from our special friends
    • a christmas wreath created our special friends

story:
SteamDolls is a steampunk inspired metroidvania game with a grimy touch of brutality. 

You are The Whisper - voiced by David Hayter (The Legendary Solid Snake).

Blast your way to your objective or stick to the shadows and perform violent assassinations on unsuspecting guards, as you struggle with the haunting apparitions of a mesmerizing witch trying to reveal the truth about a conspiracy that could shake the very foundation of the world.

ACTION, EXPLORATION, STEALTH, AND BLOOD.

Inspired by games like Castlevania and Hollow knight. Nourished by the fury of Dead Cells and the gloom of Bloodborne. A touch of societal decay from Dishonored. Lose yourself in a labyrinthine city, full of secrets and madness.

 

  •  2D brutal fast paced metroidvania in a steampunk universe.
  •  Gruesome stealth kills.

 

Example of a Violent Assassination

  •  A sprawling city to explore with Hostile, Infected and Safe Zones.
  • Meet NPC with their own tragic story.
  •  Carefully crafted interactive map.

Interactive Map

  •  David Hayter (Solid Snake) is the voice of The Whisper.
  •  Hand-drawn Cutscenes for the narrative parts.
  •  Huge abominations will try to take you down.

Example of an infected and demented Boss

“When fossil fuels were depleted, it was time for a change. But it never came. The discovery of a new superconductive material made sure the cycle never broke.”

This is the way their world ends, not with a bang - but a Whisper.

 

You will have access to many upgradable skills during the course of the game to help you fulfill your mission. Choose to be a swift and silent assassin or a slow yet powerful damage dealer. It's all up to you.

Skill Tree

Focus/Stealth Mode

The Cloaking Device

Dive & Death from Above

  •  Hacking computers and Lockpicking secured doors. 
  •  Ledge grab higher unreachable platforms.
  •  Damager Dash to pierce your enemies.
  •  Steam Boots : a new take on the classic double jump.
 

and also a whole arsenal of supernatural powers to cleanse the creatures infected by the biomechanical virus. Thanks to your love interest, Valentina, The goddess of Nature ! 

 
  • You will make them literally explode from the inside. 
  •  Melt them down with a kiss. 
  •  Summon destructive roots to make your way through the infection.

 

Steamdolls is proudly coming to all major platforms. This includes all current and next-gen console platforms, namely the Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One, PS5, and Xbox Series X.

The game will be fully dubbed in English. Subtitles in these languages are already unlocked !

Society crumbled over time, falling into a state of disarray. Innovation became stagnation. Progression to regression. Not future, nor past. An industrial era haunted by the ghost of what came before. Mankind, their mentality ever worsening as idle habits fed into the City. Unified and tortuous, it swallowed what remained of their humanity. Stealing away their free will, their determination. Crushing their souls until nothing remained. Madness.

Desperate for an alternative way to regain the glory of Old, scientists searched for a remedy.

Until they found something. Something that should have been left alone.

Mindless citizens, the needed catalyst. Transforming them. Adapting their flesh. Mere dolls. Cruel monsters.

In Steamdolls, you assume the role of a cunning thief and anarchist  known as "The Whisper" and make your way through heavily secured  environments. (Dubbed by Mr. David Hayter).

 

Here is the flamboyant cast you will encounter during the game. 

A goddess of Nature.

A rich immortal who wants to die (voiced by Mr. Christopher "Otacon" Randolph )

A female gunslinger with deadly aim.

A determined Inquisitor with a plan (voiced by Mrs. Jennifer Hale )

 

 

 

Expanded role for David Hayter with extended narration and voice lines!

Whisper's Lair (FREE FOR ALL BACKERS OF THE GAME)

Get your own lair, and mould it to your liking. Decide how to decorate. Pet and feed your trusty cat. Create a stoic fortress of solitude, or lavish the walls with velvet and hedonistic beauty. Items and decorations can be bought in a shop, found in the twisted halls of the demented world, along with a set of completely new quests where you investigate and loot houses abandoned by those fleeing the city.

Mr. Christopher Randolph, the one and only "Otacon" from the Metal Gear Series, joins forces again with his friend Solid Snake. But this time, they are facing a different kind of danger. 

No Rest for the Wicked (FREE FOR ALL BACKERS OF THE GAME)

A new chapter with a tremendous new skill at your disposal : The Dimension Shift !

What does Valentina, The goddess of Nature, want with The Whisper ? Rifts to her world are appearing all over the city, and you will discover what her desires are. Old scenes become new and twisted, a novel type of ruination comes to thecity full of vines, and even previous familiar levels will become extended beyond existence, into new paths to Valentina’s dimension. 

New locations, new gameplay, new music, new cutscenes ... and new language !

Once upon a Gun (FREE FOR ALL BACKERS OF THE GAME)

A new playable character joins the battle ! Take control of Agnes, the Gunslinger. Wreak havoc upon the militia and destroy Biomechanical infected creatures with your new powerful ranged skills. Being a Gunslinger, Agnes has a different arsenal and paradigm of combat. Much more than just a fresh coat of paint, you will come to see and experience the Steamdolls world in a new light with an added storyline and narrative.

And of course, the new game + mode will also be unlocked.

The Old Ones (FREE FOR ALL BACKERS OF THE GAME)

The hunter becomes the hunted. An old excavation site, darkness is everywhere. Stay in the light. Confront new, blind, enemies with super hearing, and grotesque bosses born from the dark. Discover a whole new narrative and witness the secrets of the infection before The Great Collapse.

New locations, new gameplay,new music, new cutscenes !

Jennifer Hale, the absolute star behind the most iconic voices of legendary video games (Commander Shepard in the original Mass Effect Trilogy, Naomi Hunter in the Metal Gear Series, Samus Aran in the Metroid Prime Trilogy and more) joins the cast as the ultimate enemy of the Whisper over the course of the entire game.

 

Digital

Physical

From the standard hired henchman who will be easily dispatched to the dangerous and disgusting mutated monster by a bio-mechanical virus, you have all kind of adversaries and deformed Bosses in Steamdolls. 

Jeremy Hagry is a creative music composer who idolises bringing visual and interactive projects with the help of sound, music, and noise. He is greatly influenced by Blade Runner and the likes.

By the use of organic, detailed and hybrid sounds, Jeremy aims to create a sonic universe for Steamdolls which embodies sentiments of adventure and atmospherical epic-ness.

The Shady Gentlemen began to work online together by creating the graphic novel "Steamdolls". The overall working dynamic was cool enough and they decided to flesh the Steamdolls universe with multiple projects.

For The Shady Gentlemen:

  • Yoann Peter: Developer & Game Designer
  • Etienne ETN Vrithof: Art direction
  • Jeremy Hagry: Sound design & composer

 

For Top Hat Studios, Inc. - publishing, PR, logistics, and port development and engineering:

  • Andy Andi Han: Producer
  • Joseph Brown: Executive Producer and Chief Engineer

story:
Hello

I am Santiago Zapata, the developer of Ananias, a classic Roguelike game designed to be played comfortably in touch screen devices such as smartphones and tablets, as well as easily accessible through any modern browser.

You can play the current demo of the game online here, or download it for your Android device. It's free!

We are a four persons team working to create an awesome classic roguelike experience on modern devices. Using funds from you, the community, we were able to create this demo, but to finish the game we need your help.

We want to provide a genuine roguelike experience; not a roguelite, but a game that stays close to the foundations of the roguelike genre, except the accessibility barrier that prevents so many people from enjoying them

So far we have been able to deploy our demo to Google Play Store, where it's been installed by about 24.000 users; we want to finish its development, delivering a complete product.

What does this game play like?

Gameplay is designed to be simple and fun; your goal is to survive about 25 levels, and fetch an ancient artifact located at the end.

At the beginning of the game you can pick a monster pet to join you in your adventure, each one of them has different abilities and can evolve into powerful creatures using magic spells found into the dungeon.

There are 4 classes, each one with its own strengths and weaknesses:

Alchemist

Shoots liquid at enemies (Acid, Liquid Fire, and other potions)

Can mix reagents into potions without danger of explosion.

Starts with powerful potions (Flame Potion for example which deals a lot of fire damage when thrown)

Arcane

Can cast the most powerful spells without danger of backfiring

Extends power of magic wands

Starts with powerful spells (like Charm Monster which makes any creature become your ally)

Paladin

Can use all weapons and armor

Blocks attacks using his shield

Extends lifetime of weapons

Hunter

Never misses a shot with a bow

Performs critical damage with bows

Prevents arrows from breaking

The Dungeon

The levels in the dungeon are randomly generated every time you play, so you have to explore the level gathering useful equipment and looking the stairs to the next level, while avoiding death and managing your limited resources.

  • ...will you drop your spare weapon and carry this potion with you, knowing it could be useful on the next level?
  • ...will you risk attacking a group of enemies to fetch that powerful armor that could save your life? or will you better run away to save your hitpoints
  • ...will you withstand the enemy attacks to reach the backrow and kill the phantom who is constantly healing all others?
  • ...will you carry with you that powerful weapon to use it against strong enemies two levels below, even if that means using up inventory space and attacking with a weaker weapon?

The odds are against you, but if you die there's always a chance to start again and wish for better fortune

What makes this game different from other roguelikes?

Ananias is designed from the ground up with the idea of a straightforward user experience for a touch screen device; interactions are optimized so you don't have to waste time with cumbersome movement, while still allowing you to explore the dungeon and fight the dwellers of the dungeon.

A simple gameplay is also a strong design focus; the game is designed for you to be able to do quick playthroughs, trying to delve deeper into the dungeon every time.

There are 41 enemy types, each with an unique feature that makes him stand apart from the rest. We are favoring uniqueness versus quantity in the monster design. Let me show you some of them!

Satyr: This mystical race inhabits the temple ruins, they move quickly so keep an eye on them!
Necromancer: These sorcerors meddle with the realms of the dead, they can summon undead servant to do their command
Fencer: Masters of the swords, they are able to easily disarm their enemies leaving them at their mercy
Demonspawn:This dark demonical race is able to warp next to their enemy giving them no chance to escape their doom

The game is being developed using the phaser.io library, one of quickest growing frameworks for HTML5 mobile development; it has great integration with CocoonJS, which in turn is capable of generating native packages for a lot of platforms.

What we need and what we'll do

Back on September 2014 we ran a campaign which allowed us to produce the current demo of the game. But we need your support to finish the product and take it to the public.

We are looking forward for 1.000 USD to use them on the following:

Completing the Sprite Pack

We are going to to enhance the appearance of the levels by changing the way they are rendered and adding furniture and features into the levels, we also need new graphics for the items and monsters!

We are also adding animations for the different spells we have added.

Getting art for the manual

In order to create the game manual as well as helping publish the game in the different distribution channels, we need to create some art, here's a sample of the kind of art we are going to need.

Completing the Soundtrack

Right now we have only one in-game track; we need to add 5 new tracks to increase immersion into the game. Here's a sample of the current track


Having a complete high quality SFX pack

We are currently using a handful of hand picked sound effects from opengameart; they are nice, but in order to provide a more immersing experience we are looking forward to have a custom made sound effects pack including attack sounds for each enemy and magic spell, as well as for the different weapons and environmental sounds sound effects

The perks

When development of the game is finished, there will be a free version and a special version with additional features. Contributing to this campaign entitles you to the special version, along with additional perks.

All perks are cumulative, pick a high level perk and you'll get all the benefits from lower level ones


Lynx - 1 USD

Access to the "Fellowship" version of the game, where you can share your score with your friends and see it on the global and social ranking, as well as playing head to head  to see who survives longer!

Jackal - 5 USD

All "Lynx" perks plus...

A virtual postcard with art from the game, signed by the developer

Warrior - 10 USD

All "Jackal" perks plus...

  • You'll be credited as a funder in a section of the game website

Knight - 20 USD

All "Warrior" perks plus...

We will include you as a named knight of darkness, a monster that might pop up randomly into the game, including your name on it's description.

Hero - 50 USD

All "Knight" perks plus...

CD with the Original Soundtrack

Summoner - 100 USD

All "Hero" perks plus...

We will include a new monster race to the game, based on a description you'll give us, this includes doing a special sprite and programming its abilities!

Help us spread the word so this game can become a reality!

All Pixel Art on this campaign page was created by Denzi, take a look at his website!
story_txt:
Hello
I am Santiago Zapata, the developer of Ananias, a classic Roguelike
	game designed to be played comfortably in touch screen devices such as
	smartphones and tablets, as well as easily accessible through any
	modern browser.

	You can play the current demo of the game online here, or download it for
	your Android
		device. It's free!




We are a four persons team working to create an awesome classic roguelike experience on modern devices. Using funds from you, the community, we were able to create this demo, but to finish the game we need your help.
We want to provide a genuine roguelike experience; not a roguelite, but a game that stays close to the foundations of the roguelike genre, except the accessibility barrier that prevents so many people from enjoying them
So far we have been able to deploy our demo to Google Play Store, where it's been installed by about 24.000 users; we want to finish its development, delivering a complete product.
What does this game play like?
Gameplay is designed to be simple and fun; your goal is to
	survive about 25 levels, and fetch an ancient artifact located at the
	end.
At the beginning of the game you can pick a monster pet to join you in your adventure, each one of them has different abilities and can evolve into powerful creatures using magic spells found into the dungeon.
There are 4 classes, each one with its own strengths and weaknesses:




Alchemist
Shoots liquid at enemies (Acid, Liquid Fire, and other potions)
Can mix reagents into potions without danger of explosion.
Starts with powerful potions (Flame Potion for example which
	deals a lot of fire damage when thrown)



Arcane
Can cast the most powerful spells without danger of backfiring
Extends power of magic wands
Starts with powerful spells (like Charm Monster which makes any
	creature become your ally)



Paladin
Can use all weapons and armor
Blocks attacks using his shield
Extends lifetime of weapons



Hunter
Never misses a shot with a bow
Performs critical damage with bows
Prevents arrows from breaking

The Dungeon
The levels in the dungeon are randomly generated every time you
	play, so you have to explore the level gathering useful equipment and
	looking the stairs to the next level, while avoiding death and managing
	your limited resources.

...will you drop your spare weapon and carry this potion with
		you, knowing it could be useful on the next level?
...will you risk attacking a group of enemies to fetch that
		powerful armor that could save your life? or will you better run away
		to save your hitpoints
...will you withstand the enemy attacks to reach the backrow
		and kill the phantom who is constantly healing all others?
...will you carry with you that powerful weapon to use it
		against strong enemies two levels below, even if that means using up
		inventory space and attacking with a weaker weapon?

The odds are against you, but if you die there's always a chance
	to start again and wish for better fortune
What makes this game different from other roguelikes?
Ananias is designed from the ground up with the idea of a
	straightforward user experience for a touch screen device; interactions
	are optimized so you don't have to waste time with cumbersome movement,
	while still allowing you to explore the dungeon and fight the dwellers
	of the dungeon.
A simple gameplay is also a strong design focus; the game is
	designed for you to be able to do quick playthroughs, trying to delve
	deeper into the dungeon every time.
There are 41 enemy types, each with an unique feature that makes
	him stand apart from the rest. We are favoring uniqueness versus
	quantity in the monster design. Let me show you some of them!





Satyr: This mystical race inhabits the temple
				ruins, they move quickly so keep an eye on them!




Necromancer: These sorcerors meddle with the
				realms of the dead, they can summon undead servant to do their
				command




Fencer: Masters of the swords, they are able to
				easily disarm their enemies leaving them at their mercy




Demonspawn:This dark demonical race is able to warp
				next to their enemy giving them no chance to escape their doom



The game is being developed using the phaser.io library, one of
	quickest growing frameworks for HTML5 mobile development; it has great
	integration with CocoonJS, which in turn is capable of generating
	native packages for a lot of platforms.
What we need and what we'll do
Back on September 2014 we ran a campaign which allowed us to produce the current demo of the game. But we need
your support to finish the product and take it to the public.
We are looking forward for 1.000 USD to use them on the
	following:
Completing the Sprite Pack
We are going to to enhance the appearance of the levels by changing the way they are rendered and adding
furniture and features into the levels, we also need new graphics for the items and monsters!We are also adding animations for the different spells we have added.
Getting art for the manual
In order to create the game manual as well as helping publish the game in the different distribution
	channels, we need to create some art, here's a sample of the kind of art we are going to need.



Completing the Soundtrack
Right now we have only one in-game track; we need to add 5
	new tracks to increase immersion into the game. Here's
	a sample of the current track

	We are currently using a handful of hand picked sound effects from
	opengameart; they are nice, but in order to provide a more immersing
	experience we are looking forward to have a custom made sound effects
	pack including attack sounds for each enemy and magic spell, as well as
	for the different weapons and environmental sounds sound effects




The perks
When development of the game is finished, there will be a free
	version and a special version with additional features. Contributing to this
	campaign entitles you to the special version, along with additional
	perks.
All perks are cumulative, pick a high level perk and you'll get

Access to the "Fellowship" version of the game, where you can share your score with your friends and see it on the global and social ranking, as well as playing head to head  to see who survives longer!

story:
STILL OPEN TO CONTRIBUTIONS!

We have now transitioned to "IN-DEMAND FUNDING," which means you are still able to contribute even though the main campaign timeline has concluded. We can still work towards achieving the stretch goal(s) as listed below!

Stretch Goal $2,037/$10,000

20.37% FUNDED

After the primary goal has been achieved, we'll go even further by adding the following into the game: 

  • High Command Officer uniforms and permission set
  • Mission Leader uniforms and permission set
  • Personal decals available on Infantry uniforms
  • Return of the Old Bunkers (City and Pentagon) with new and improved artwork
  • We'll introduce several new towns to the game and expand the map
  • We'll target advertising to help expand our reach and bring new players in

STRETCH GOAL: RETURN OF THE OLD BUNKER (WORK IN PROGRESS)

STRETCH GOAL: MISSION LEADER CONCEPTS (WORK IN PROGRESS)

____________________________________

WWII Online - 2018 Funding Campaign

100% FUNDED ON PRIMARY GOAL - GREAT JOB!

2018 is poised to be an exceptional year for WWII Online with the delivery of new vehicle content and finally, we're making huge breakthroughs working on Terrain! As a mostly volunteer-based team, CRS continues its great work unlocking new development capabilities and propel the game forward, however we need YOUR help to give it an extra push from the WWII Online community to see that important objectives are met.

Upgrading the game to a 64-bit client is now a matter of vital importance! Apple announced its plan to discontinue support of 32-bit clients effective September 2018, essentially discontinuing our Mac client. We expect Microsoft to follow Apple in the not so distant future. In light of this fact, we have some software we need to acquire so that we can begin rapidly upgrading our clients to 64-bit to ensure we meet this deadline!

With that, let's have a quick look at what your contributions will go towards (see below).

Quick Overview of Funding Goals

Here is a quick overview of what your contribution(s) will be focused towards:

  • Secure critical software to upgrade to a 64-bit game client (Windows & Mac).
  • Integrated Voice Comms deposit.
  • +1 Year of support for Creator Software (Enables the creation of new vehicles and terrain).
  • +1 Year of essential Project Management Tools.
  • Hardware upgrades to improve infrastructure and services in the colocation facility.
  • Support for completion of the 2018 Development Roadmap.
  • Stretch Goal (Officer & Mission Leader Uniforms, Old Bunkers and more).

All contributors ($50+) will receive the following in-game 2018 funder patch!

64-bit Game Client (Upgrade)

The purchase of software is required for us to upgrade the game client to 64-bit (and it's not cheap, but it is necessary). This is massively important to do as quick as we can, and there are some big rewards to come from it that will benefit everyone!

Here are some advantages the game will receive by moving to a 64-bit client:

  • Memory limitations will be significantly reduced.
  • Better client side (you) performance.
  • Multi-threading becomes possible.
  • More RAM (memory) can be used.
  • More infantry, vehicles and terrain objectives can be rendered in the game world.
  • Improved Infantry production pipeline.
  • Works on latest versions of common 3D modeling software.
  • Better and faster delivery of infantry work from our artists.
  • DEP, NX, SNEP, full ALSR (etc).
    • This means the client is more secure against those that try to compromise the game!

Integrated Voice Comms (Deposit)

This will provide us with the initial monies required to get a head start on our integrated voice communication implementation. From there we'll be able to develop it further.

+1 Year of Creator Software License

We're finally making some great headway with the Creator Software. You've now seen the following units enter WWII Online in the last year, all made possible by this software:

  • Self-Propelled Anti-Aircraft Vehicles (2).
  • Tank Busters (3).
  • Vehicle crew member upgrades (several).

All of the vehicles upcoming in 2018 Roadmap will require this tool. In addition we'll need it to modify anything to do with the Terrain objects, which is now finally starting to become very feasible.

+1 Year Project Management Tools

This is absolutely an essential item to keep our world wide, remote based, volunteer team organized. We have a lot of talent contributing, but the tools are essential to ensure that we are able to organize our efforts and meet our team's timelines! This covers renewal and upgrades for: 

  • JIRA (Task Management for 50 users).
  • Confluence (Documentation & Planning for 50 Users).
  • Bitbucket (Code repository for 10 users).

 

Server Hardware Upgrades

Our work to improve our colocation (server housing area) continues to be of monumental importance. With each effort that we make to upgrade our hardware, we ensure that things run smoothly and are as modernized as possible. This would cover the following upgrades: 

  • Hard Drives
    • Everything needs to be backed up routinely. This requires quite a bit of HDD space, and HDD's constantly running means we need to transition them out to avoid failure.
  • Cables and Adapters

 

How can I help?

  • CONTRIBUTE TO THIS CAMPAIGN!
  • Educate and inform others in the community about this funding initiative, and what it means.
  • Spread the message by social media sharing, directly to e-mail, anything to get the word out!

Only 40 DAYS FOR FUNDING!

With your backing we can make these goals possible. We hope our continued delivery of software upgrades, new game content, bug fixes, and our abundant transparency has worked to earn your trust and confidence.

We hope you are as thrilled as we are about this year's activity and effort! Let's advance the WWII Online dream even further into the future and get this funding goal achieved, WOOT!

- Thank you from all of us at Cornered Rat Software!

CONTRIBUTE NOW AND SUPPORT THE GAME, THE COMMUNITY, AND THE RATS!

Please feel free to message us if you have any questions relating to this Campaign, go to http://support.wwiionline.com.

Note: All billing transactions will occur through Indiegogo. For transaction assistance, coordinate with Indiegogo.com's support portal.

story:
Welcome to the latest Egyptian Miniatures Indiegogo Campaign!  I was inspired by combination of archaeology, history and Hollywood films to create a range of pseudo-historical Egyptian figures for use in role-playing games, wargaming and collecting.  Two years ago I launched my first Indiegogo campaign with a single set of three miniatures.  From this humble beginning the Egyptian range has expanded to over 140 figures.  In previous campaigns the main focus was on the royal court and harem of pharaoh but this time we have also included a number of sets which are characters and creatures drawn from Egyptian mythology, and Hollywood inspired fantasy adventure and horror films.  This will enable you to take your adventures beyond the confines of the palace and into the desert and long forgotten tombs of once great pharaohs.

A total of 21 core sets of Egyptian miniatures are being offered as perk selections which are a good mix of personalities, warriors, adventurers, beasts and creatures.  I have been fortunate enough to enlist the services of a really talented group of sculptors: David Soderquist, Tim Prow, Andy Pieper, Brother Vinni and Micah Nichols, who have sculpted some truly amazing miniatures - full of character and originality.  I really hope you all can join in and support the campaign.  These high-quality 28mm miniatures are made from a lead-free pewter alloy and have an incredible amount of detail and personality. Whether you are a collector or gamer you are certain to enjoy these figures!  Check out the gallery for more images!


The Egyptian Miniatures IV campaign was successfully funded on 14 December 2014.  Due to the campaign’s popularity we decided reactivate it through Indiegogo's InDemand program.  This will allow you to get hold of some fantastic miniatures at a great price and will enable us to continue to raise funds using the Indiegogo platform to help pay for additional production moulds and perhaps commission some more miniatures.

  • There are a variety of perks to suit every budget, which range in price from $20 to $330.  Each perk allows you to choose from the 21 sets of miniatures on offer to tailor your order to your own gaming needs.  There are also two special perk deals (The Egyptian Undead and the Egyptian Female Guards) which consist of 8 specific set of miniatures for the bargain price of only $85.  The sets which comprise the two deals can’t be substituted.  A number of non-standard priced sets are available as add-ons to your perk, as well as sets which were released during previous Indiegogo campaigns for a flat rate of $12 (unless priced otherwise).

  • At this stage in the game this is very much a no-frills operation and everyone will receive their sets of miniatures in small zip-lock bags with plastic slotta bases.  (Sorry - no blister packs yet!).

  • Postage world-wide is included as part of the perk, and will be sent standard airmail or regular post.  Please note that standard airmail is not insured, tracked or signed for.  IF YOU REQUIRE SIGNED, RECORDED OR SPECIAL DELIVERY THAT WILL BE AT YOUR OWN COST.  Please contact me regarding rates.

  • When can I expect to get my miniatures?  There is no set deadline to the InDemand program so perks that are purchased should be sent out as soon as the miniatures are available.  At present all of the miniatures, except the Evil Concubines set, have been moulded and cast so you should get your miniatures within a few weeks, if not sooner.  I expect to have the Evil Concubines cast by the middle of June.  If there are any delays I will be sure to let you know exactly what is going on and how long it might take.



1. Queen Nefertiti and Attendants

2.  Pharaoh with High-priest and Courtier

3.  Egyptian Female Guards I (Spears)

4.  Egyptian Female Guards II (Archers)

5.  Egyptian Female Guards III (Melee Weapons - shields incl.)

6.  Egyptian Female Guards IV (Officer and Axe-women)

7. Armed Egyptian Girls

8. Exotic Pets

9.  Nubian Hyena Handler and Axe-man

10. Senet Game and Players


11.  Skeletal Guards I

12.  Mummy Pharaoh and Skeletal Attendants

13. Skeletal Guards II

14. Egyptian Vampires

15. Tomb Robbers I

16. Tomb Robbers II

17. Nile Crocodiles

18. Court Personalities IV (Guard Officer, Scribe and Overseer)

19. Concubine Variants

20. Nubian Priest, King and Guard Officer  NEW!

21. Evil Concubines I (Orc, Drow, Cyclopean)  NEW!






Level 3 contributors and higher have the option to add on additional sets of miniatures to their existing perks at $12 a set (Unless priced otherwise).  Miniatures available for add-ons include the 21 core sets from this campaign, non-standard priced sets, and all of the sets that were released in the three previous Indiegogos.

ADD-ON SETS:

Mummy Kidnapping  $15

Ammut the Devourer  $15

Skeletal Lion  $10

Hunting Dogs (pharaoh hound, Basenji, Segugio hound)  $10

Egyptian Kids (Girl and Boy)  $5

Egyptianised Dejah Thoris  $5


SETS AVAILABLE AS ADD-ONS FROM PREVIOUS CAMPAIGNS:

  1. Egyptian Queen and Attendants

  2. Court Personalities I (Vizier, Pygmy Priest, Food Taster)

  3. Egyptian Ladies

  4. Egyptian Royal Guards I (Spears)

  5. Egyptian Royal Guards II (Axes)

  6. Egyptian Royal Guards III (Khopesh Swords)

  7. Serving Girls (4 figure set)

  8. Egyptian Lady and Maids

  9. Young Concubines (25mm)

  10. Court Personalities II (Egyptian Noblewoman, Libyan Princess, Concubine with Dagger)

  11. Court Personalities III (Bodyguard, Physician, Scribe)

  12. Foreign Slave Girls

  13. Egyptian Assassins

  14. Eunuch Harem Guards I

  15. Eunuch Harem Guards II

  16. Eunuch Harem Guards III

  17. Eunuch Harem Guards IV

  18. Eunuch Harem Guard Characters

  19. Egyptian Sorceress and Attendants

  20. Egyptian Entertainers I

  21. Egyptian Entertainers II

  22. Giant Cobras  *Available at $10 a set

  23. Egyptian Princess and Attendants

  24. Sedja Beast  *Available at $10 a piece

  25. Nubian Guards I

  26. Court Attendants

  27. Egyptianised Goblin Minion *$4

These sets can be viewed on the Dark Fable Miniatures Website:

Dark Fable Miniatures


Other Ways You Can Help

Pharaoh has sent messengers far and wide to spread the word, but you too can help!
  • Ask friends, gaming associates, minions and anyone you think might be interested in these excellent miniatures from ancient Egypt to get the word out.
  • You can put a link to this campaign on your blog, forum or website.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

of miniatures for the bargain price of only $85.  The sets which comprise the two deals can’t
be substituted.  A number of non-standard priced sets are available as
add-ons to your perk, as well as sets which were released during previous
Indiegogo campaigns for a flat rate of $12 (unless priced otherwise).

At this stage in the
     game this is very much a no-frills operation and everyone will
     receive their sets of miniatures in small zip-lock bags with plastic slotta
     bases.  (Sorry - no blister packs yet!).



Postage world-wide is
     included as part of the perk, and will be sent standard airmail or regular
     post.  Please note that standard
     airmail is not insured, tracked or signed for.  IF YOU REQUIRE SIGNED, RECORDED OR
     SPECIAL DELIVERY THAT WILL BE AT YOUR OWN COST.  Please contact me regarding rates.


When can I expect to get my miniatures?  There is no set deadline to the InDemand program so
perks that are purchased should be sent out as soon as the miniatures are available.  At present all of the miniatures, except the Evil
Concubines set, have been moulded and cast so you should get your miniatures
within a few weeks, if not sooner.  I expect to have the Evil Concubines
cast by the middle of June.  If there are
any delays I will be sure to let you know exactly what is going on and how long
it might take.
1. Queen Nefertiti and Attendants2.  Pharaoh with High-priest and Courtier3.  Egyptian Female Guards I (Spears)4.  Egyptian Female Guards II (Archers)5.  Egyptian Female Guards III (Melee Weapons - shields incl.)6.  Egyptian Female Guards IV (Officer and Axe-women)7. Armed Egyptian Girls
8. Exotic Pets
9.  Nubian Hyena Handler and Axe-man10. Senet Game and Players11.  Skeletal Guards I12.  Mummy Pharaoh and Skeletal Attendants13. Skeletal Guards II14. Egyptian Vampires15. Tomb Robbers I16. Tomb Robbers II17. Nile Crocodiles18. Court Personalities IV (Guard Officer, Scribe and Overseer)19. Concubine Variants20. Nubian Priest, King and Guard Officer  NEW!21. Evil Concubines I (Orc, Drow, Cyclopean)  NEW!Level 3 contributors and higher have the option to add on additional sets of miniatures to their existing perks at $12 a set (Unless priced otherwise).  Miniatures available for add-ons include the 21 core sets from this campaign, non-standard priced sets, and all of the sets that were released in the three previous Indiegogos.ADD-ON SETS:
Mummy Kidnapping  $15


Ammut the Devourer  $15


Skeletal Lion  $10



Hunting Dogs (pharaoh hound, Basenji, Segugio hound)  $10

 Other Ways You Can Help
 


Pharaoh has sent messengers far and wide to spread the word, but you too can help!

Ask friends, gaming associates, minions and anyone you think might be interested in these excellent miniatures from ancient Egypt to get the word out.

You can put a link to this campaign on your blog, forum or website.

Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • I'm Devin Sikiric, and I'm working in collaboration with my two closest friends.
  • This campaign is all about bringing the dubstep guns to life and actually making them available for public use.
  • If you help us achieve our goal, you will be creating history as this will definitley change the way parties are started. Not just that, there are so many things you can do with this that is just plain AWESOME!!!

You cant get these anywhere else in the world, and if you did, they would be small tiny dubstep guns with only one song and low volume. I have one of these and its just annoying.



What We Need & What You Get

Here is the breakdown:

  • We need to raise $30,000 in order to make all the molds/hardware/programming/ finding the perfect parts and creating the first 300 dubstep guns!!!
  • When it comes to our perks, one of them is actually getting your own dubstep gun! Not just that, one of them is getting a GOLD PLATED ONE AND EDC TICKETS!!! 
  • If for some reason we do not reach our goal, we will still put all of it towards making the dubstep guns, if we cant reach our goal we wont be able to make the 300 we want but we will put everything we raise into this. We want one just as bad as you guys.
  • DON'T FORGET, YOU GUYS CAN LEAVE US YOUR IDEAS AND IF THEY ARE GOOD WE WILL ADD THEM INTO THE FINAL PRODUCT!!!!


The Impact

Think about this for a second, there is no other campaign out there for this, this is literally the first and only for the dubstep gun, if we cant reach our goal, nobody else is going to make them. Its up to you guys to help us make this happen.

  • The value in this product is really just incredible, you are getting everything made in the USA and all put together by HAND. With close inspection on everything to make sure you get only the highest quality Weapon available.
  • As for other projects you can see, just watch the video and you can see some of the stuff we have made before :)
  • I, myself have made the led shoes you have seen in the video as well as a dress with over 2000 leds on it that were all controlled via iphone. Not just that i have also created led suits that were wirelessly controlled that we three wore to our senior prom.


Risks & Challenges

As far as risks and challenges go, what could possible happen to us is that a computer could go down, or one of our cnc machines can go down. With that being said, this is bad ofcourse, but these things are replaceable. Remeber, everything is being done here in the USA. Its not like we are going to be dealing with any over seas problems.

  • Here are a few things that qualify us: We have a team, we understand all that it takes to manufacture products. I myself understand hardware and software, my teammates understand 3d design and have the appropriate machinery to complete this task.
  • Throughout each step of the way there will be challenges, but our team is ready every step of the way. f we have a software issue, i can solve it, If we have a 3d issue we can solve it, and if we have a machine issue, we can solve it. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant contribute then thats no prob!!!

  • If you would like to help but cant contribute then please all you have to do is tell people about it! By just telling one person that is enough to set of a huge shockwave!
  • Remeber, if you know how to use indiegogos' share tools, then use them!!!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
HOLIDAZE is a fun, easy to learn, holiday themed drinking card game that incorporates strategy with beverages. Think Cards Against Humanity meets Flip Cup.

The premise and rules are simple: there are four cards; Holiday Cards, Birthday Cards, Steal Cards, and Drink Cards.

Each Holiday card has a unique effect or action- for example; For Valentine's Day, player's must go around asking each other "out." If the other player says yes, you are both safe and off the market. Any player denied must drink alone (just like the real Valentines Day). 

For the Election Day card, you nominate two players and the group votes on who will be the next President (thus making a new rule). The player with the least votes drinks.

There are mini games for Groundhogs Day (Bill F'n Murray), Columbus Day ("Discover" someone else's drink), Mardi Gras (Strip or Drink) and so on and so on.

The Birthday cards are wild cards which let you emulate the effect of any Holiday card currently played on the table.

The Steal cards allow you to take one of the played Holiday cards for yourself or blindly take one from another player's hand.

The Drink cards are used to make someone drink, but can also be used to defend against a drink assigned to you.

I have always loved games, and have made over a dozen or so in my adulthood but this is the first where I actually made a full custom deck. I brought to a few parties on a whim and found huge success- I had people offering to buy it off me on the spot. Hopefully that drunken enthusiasm shows itself here (hey, aren't you thirsty?).

The money I'm raising will be spent four ways:

1- Hiring a professional artist to design all the cards ($300-500)

2- Printing the decks in bulk to save on costs ($400-500)

3- Shipping ($100-200)

I shot this video with my cellphone and edited it myself so I hope you enjoy it- but I KNOW you will enjoy HOLIDAZE!
